verses.verse: These <S%H428><s%> are the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments, <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye shall observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of thy fathers <S%H1><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> thee to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> live <S%H2416><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H127><s%>

Ye shall utterly destroy <S%H6><s%> <S%H6><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the places, <S%H4725><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> <S%H853><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> shall possess <S%H3423><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> their gods, <S%H430><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the high <S%H7311><s%> mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the hills, <S%H1389><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> green <S%H7488><s%> tree: <S%H6086><s%>

And ye shall overthrow <S%H5422><s%> <S%H853><s%> their altars, <S%H4196><s%> and break <S%H7665><s%> <S%H853><s%> their pillars, <S%H4676><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> their groves <S%H842><s%> with fire; <S%H784><s%> and ye shall hew down <S%H1438><s%> the graven images <S%H6456><s%> of their gods, <S%H430><s%> and destroy <S%H6><s%> <S%H853><s%> the names <S%H8034><s%> of them out of <S%H4480><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%>
Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> out of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> your tribes <S%H7626><s%> to put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there, <S%H8033><s%> even unto his habitation <S%H7933><s%> shall ye seek, <S%H1875><s%> and thither <S%H8033><s%> thou shalt come: <S%H935><s%>

And thither <S%H8033><s%> ye shall bring <S%H935><s%> your burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> and your sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> and your tithes, <S%H4643><s%> and <S%H853><s%> heave offerings <S%H8641><s%> of your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and your vows, <S%H5088><s%> and your freewill offerings, <S%H5071><s%> and the firstlings <S%H1062><s%> of your herds <S%H1241><s%> and of your flocks: <S%H6629><s%>

And there <S%H8033><s%> ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> and ye shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that ye put <S%H4916><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> unto, ye <S%H859><s%> and your households, <S%H1004><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath blessed <S%H1288><s%> thee.

Ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> after all <S%H3605><s%> the things that <S%H834><s%> we <S%H587><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> is right <S%H3477><s%> in his own eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> ye are not <S%H3808><s%> as yet <S%H5704><s%> <S%H6258><s%> come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the rest <S%H4496><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the inheritance, <S%H5159><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> you.

But when ye go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> and dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> giveth you to inherit, <S%H5157><s%> <S%H853><s%> and when he giveth you rest <S%H5117><s%> from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> round about, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%> so that ye dwell <S%H3427><s%> in safety; <S%H983><s%>

Then there shall be <S%H1961><s%> a place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> to cause his name <S%H8034><s%> to dwell <S%H7931><s%> there; <S%H8033><s%> thither <S%H8033><s%> shall ye bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> you; your burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> and your sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> your tithes, <S%H4643><s%> and the heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> your choice <S%H4005><s%> vows <S%H5088><s%> which <S%H834><s%> ye vow <S%H5087><s%> unto the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And ye shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> ye, <S%H859><s%> and your sons, <S%H1121><s%> and your daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and your menservants, <S%H5650><s%> and your maidservants, <S%H519><s%> and the Levite <S%H3881><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is within your gates; <S%H8179><s%> forasmuch <S%H3588><s%> as he hath no <S%H369><s%> part <S%H2506><s%> nor inheritance <S%H5159><s%> with <S%H854><s%> you.

Take heed <S%H8104><s%> to thyself that <S%H6435><s%> thou offer <S%H5927><s%> not thy burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou seest: <S%H7200><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall choose <S%H977><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> of thy tribes, <S%H7626><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> thou shalt offer <S%H5927><s%> thy burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee.

Notwithstanding <S%H7535><s%> thou mayest kill <S%H2076><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> thy gates, <S%H8179><s%> whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> thy soul <S%H5315><s%> lusteth after, <S%H185><s%> according to the blessing <S%H1293><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he hath given <S%H5414><s%> thee: the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%> may eat <S%H398><s%> thereof, as of the roebuck, <S%H6643><s%> and as of the hart. <S%H354><s%>
Only <S%H7535><s%> ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> the blood; <S%H1818><s%> ye shall pour <S%H8210><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> as water. <S%H4325><s%>

Thou mayest <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> within thy gates <S%H8179><s%> the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of thy corn, <S%H1715><s%> or of thy wine, <S%H8492><s%> or of thy oil, <S%H3323><s%> or the firstlings <S%H1062><s%> of thy herds <S%H1241><s%> or of thy flock, <S%H6629><s%> nor any <S%H3605><s%> of thy vows <S%H5088><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou vowest, <S%H5087><s%> nor thy freewill offerings, <S%H5071><s%> or heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of thine hand: <S%H3027><s%>

But <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> thou must eat <S%H398><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall choose, <S%H977><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and thy son, <S%H1121><s%> and thy daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and thy manservant, <S%H5650><s%> and thy maidservant, <S%H519><s%> and the Levite <S%H3881><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is within thy gates: <S%H8179><s%> and thou shalt rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> that thou puttest <S%H4916><s%> thine hands <S%H3027><s%> unto.

Take heed <S%H8104><s%> to thyself that thou forsake not <S%H6435><s%> <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Levite <S%H3881><s%> as long as thou livest <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H127><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall enlarge <S%H7337><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy border, <S%H1366><s%> as <S%H834><s%> he hath promised <S%H1696><s%> thee, and thou shalt say, <S%H559><s%> I will eat <S%H398><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> thy soul <S%H5315><s%> longeth <S%H183><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> flesh; <S%H1320><s%> thou mayest eat <S%H398><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> thy soul <S%H5315><s%> lusteth after. <S%H185><s%>

If <S%H3588><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> hath chosen <S%H977><s%> to put <S%H7760><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> be too far <S%H7368><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee, then thou shalt kill <S%H2076><s%> of thy herd <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1241><s%> and of thy flock, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6629><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> thee as <S%H834><s%> I have commanded <S%H6680><s%> thee, and thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> in thy gates <S%H8179><s%> whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> thy soul <S%H5315><s%> lusteth after. <S%H185><s%>

Even <S%H389><s%> as <S%H834><s%> <S%H853><s%> the roebuck <S%H6643><s%> and the hart <S%H354><s%> is eaten, <S%H398><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> them: the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> of them alike. <S%H3162><s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> be sure <S%H2388><s%> that thou eat <S%H398><s%> not <S%H1115><s%> the blood: <S%H1818><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> is the life; <S%H5315><s%> and thou mayest not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> the life <S%H5315><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the flesh. <S%H1320><s%>
Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> it; thou shalt pour <S%H8210><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> as water. <S%H4325><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> it; that <S%H4616><s%> it may go well <S%H3190><s%> with thee, and with thy children <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> thee, when <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> that which is right <S%H3477><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> thy holy things <S%H6944><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast, <S%H1961><s%> and thy vows, <S%H5088><s%> thou shalt take, <S%H5375><s%> and go <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall choose: <S%H977><s%>

And thou shalt offer <S%H6213><s%> thy burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and the blood, <S%H1818><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God: <S%H430><s%> and the blood <S%H1818><s%> of thy sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> shall be poured out <S%H8210><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God, <S%H430><s%> and thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

Observe <S%H8104><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> thee, that <S%H4616><s%> it may go well <S%H3190><s%> with thee, and with thy children <S%H1121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> thee forever, <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> thou doest <S%H6213><s%> that which is good <S%H2896><s%> and right <S%H3477><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God. <S%H430><s%>

When <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%> shall cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H853><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> goest <S%H935><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> them, and thou succeedest <S%H3423><s%> them, and dwellest <S%H3427><s%> in their land; <S%H776><s%>

Take heed <S%H8104><s%> to thyself that <S%H6435><s%> thou be not snared <S%H5367><s%> by following <S%H310><s%> them, after that <S%H310><s%> they be destroyed <S%H8045><s%> from before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee; and that <S%H6435><s%> thou inquire <S%H1875><s%> not after their gods, <S%H430><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> How <S%H349><s%> did these <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> their gods? <S%H430><s%> even so <S%H3651><s%> will I <S%H589><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> likewise. <S%H1571><s%>

Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> thy God: <S%H430><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he hateth, <S%H8130><s%> have they done <S%H6213><s%> unto their gods; <S%H430><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> <S%H853><s%> their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> they have burnt <S%H8313><s%> in the fire <S%H784><s%> to their gods. <S%H430><s%>

<S%H853><s%> What thing soever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H595><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> you, observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> it: thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> add <S%H3254><s%> thereto, <S%H5921><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> diminish <S%H1639><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> it.
